mapper.select:
SELECT d.`name` as areaName,dc.id,
dc.name deptName,
dc.realName deptName,
COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=1 THEN a.id END ) AS selldeal, COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=2 THEN a.id END ) AS rentdeal,COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=3 THEN a.id END ) AS newdeal, COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=4 THEN a.id END ) AS sellhouseadd,COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=5 THEN a.id END ) AS sellhouseopen, COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=6 THEN a.id END ) AS sellhousekey,COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=7 THEN a.id END ) AS sellhouseexclusive, COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=8 THEN a.id END ) AS sellhouseprice,COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=9 THEN a.id END ) AS sellhousespace, COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=10 THEN a.id END ) AS sellhousecancelorder,COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=11 THEN a.id END ) AS sellhouseothersell, COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=12 THEN a.id END ) AS sellhouseotherrent,COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=13 THEN a.id END ) AS sellhousedelay, COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=14 THEN a.id END ) AS sellhousetaobao,COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=15 THEN a.id END ) AS sellhousepicture, COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=16 THEN a.id END ) AS sellhousevideo,COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=17 THEN a.id END ) AS sellhouseentrust, COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=18 THEN a.id END ) AS renthouseadd,COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=19 THEN a.id END ) AS renthouseopen, COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=20 THEN a.id END ) AS renthousekey,COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=21 THEN a.id END ) AS renthouseexclusive, COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=22 THEN a.id END ) AS renthouseprice,COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=23 THEN a.id END ) AS renthousespace, COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=24 THEN a.id END ) AS renthousecancelorder,COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=25 THEN a.id END ) AS renthouseothersell, COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=26 THEN a.id END ) AS renthouseotherrent,COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=27 THEN a.id END ) AS renthousedelay, COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=28 THEN a.id END ) AS renthousetaobao,COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=29 THEN a.id END ) AS renthousepicture, COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=30 THEN a.id END ) AS renthousevideo,COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=31 THEN a.id END ) AS renthouseentrust, COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=32 THEN a.id END ) AS sellcustomeradd,COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=33 THEN a.id END ) AS sellcustomerinvalid, COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=34 THEN a.id END ) AS sellcustomerdeposit,COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=35 THEN a.id END ) AS sellcustomerothersell, COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=36 THEN a.id END ) AS sellcustomerotherrent,COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=37 THEN a.id END ) AS sellcustomerdelay, COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=38 THEN a.id END ) AS sellcustomertaobao,COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=39 THEN a.id END ) AS rentcustomeradd, COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=40 THEN a.id END ) AS rentcustomerinvalid,COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=41 THEN a.id END ) AS rentcustomerdeposit, COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=42 THEN a.id END ) AS rentcustomerothersell,COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=43 THEN a.id END ) AS rentcustomerotherrent, COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=44 THEN a.id END ) AS rentcustomerdelay,COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=45 THEN a.id END ) AS rentcustomertaobao, COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=46 or a.operatTypeId=59 THEN a.id END ) AS housefollowup,COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=47 or a.operatTypeId=60 THEN a.id END ) AS houserealexploration, COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=48 THEN a.id END ) AS sellcustomerfollowup,COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=49 THEN a.id END ) AS rentcustomerfollowup, COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=50 THEN a.id END ) AS sellcustomershowed,COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=51 THEN a.id END ) AS sellhouseshowed, COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=52 THEN a.id END ) AS rentcustomershowed,COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=53 THEN a.id END ) AS renthouseshowed, COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=54 THEN a.id END ) AS newhouseshowed,COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=55 THEN a.id END ) AS newhouseshoweddisc, COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=56 THEN a.id END ) AS houselookphone,COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=57 THEN a.id END ) AS sellcustomerlookphone, COUNT(CASE WHEN a.operatTypeId=58 THEN a.id END ) AS rentcustomerlookphone FROM sys_dept AS d
RIGHT JOIN sys_dept AS dc ON d.id=dc.parentId AND dc.isvalid=1 AND d.deptTypeId=#{deptTypeId} LEFT JOIN report_operation_analysis AS a ON a.departmentId LIKE CONCAT(dc.id,'%') AND a.addTime between #{beginDate} AND concat(#{endDate},' 23:59:59')
RIGHT JOIN sys_user AS dc ON d.id=dc.deptId AND dc.isvalid=1 AND d.deptTypeId=5 LEFT JOIN report_operation_analysis AS a ON a.operatorId =dc.id AND a.addTime between #{beginDate} AND concat(#{endDate},' 23:59:59')
WHERE d.id IS NOT NULL AND d.companyId=#{companyId}
and d.id=#{deptId}
GROUP BY dc.id order by d.id
SELECT cast(id as char) as value,fieldValue as name,fieldCode FROM dynamicform_field_value WHERE isValid=1 AND widgetCode= #{widgetCode}

SELECT
(CASE WHEN d.deptTypeId=2 THEN '大区' WHEN d.deptTypeId=3 THEN '区' WHEN d.deptTypeId=4 THEN '店' WHEN d.deptTypeId=5 THEN '组' END) AS areaName,d.id,d.`name` AS deptName,
d.`name` AS areaName,dc.id,dc.realName AS deptName,
COUNT(CASE WHEN sh.statusId=1 THEN f.id END) cell_1,COUNT(CASE WHEN sh.statusId=2 THEN f.id END) cell_2,COUNT(CASE WHEN sh.statusId=3 THEN f.id END) cell_3, COUNT(CASE WHEN sh.statusId=4 THEN f.id END) cell_4,COUNT(CASE WHEN sh.statusId=5 THEN f.id END) cell_5,COUNT(CASE WHEN sh.statusId=6 THEN f.id END) cell_6, COUNT(CASE WHEN sh.statusId=7 THEN f.id END) cell_7,COUNT(CASE WHEN sh.statusId=8 THEN f.id END) cell_8,COUNT(CASE WHEN sh.statusId=9 THEN f.id END) cell_9, COUNT(CASE WHEN sh.statusId=10 THEN f.id END) cell_10,COUNT(CASE WHEN sh.statusId=11 THEN f.id END) cell_11,COUNT(CASE WHEN sh.statusId=12 THEN f.id END) cell_12, COUNT(f.id) total FROM sys_dept AS d
RIGHT JOIN sys_user AS dc ON dc.isValid=1 AND dc.deptId=d.id LEFT JOIN hs_followrecord AS f ON f.isValid=1 AND f.addTime between #{beginDate} AND concat(#{endDate},' 23:59:59') AND f.operatorId=dc.id
LEFT JOIN hs_followrecord AS f ON f.isValid=1 AND f.addTime between #{beginDate} AND concat(#{endDate},' 23:59:59') AND f.deptId LIKE CONCAT(d.id,'%')
LEFT JOIN hs_secondhandhouse AS sh ON sh.isValid=1 AND sh.id=f.shhId WHERE d.id IS not NULL AND d.companyId=#{companyId}
and d.id=#{deptId}
GROUP BY dc.id ORDER BY d.id
AND d.deptTypeId=#{deptTypeId} GROUP BY d.id ORDER BY d.id

SELECT
(CASE WHEN d.deptTypeId=2 THEN '大区' WHEN d.deptTypeId=3 THEN '区' WHEN d.deptTypeId=4 THEN '店' WHEN d.deptTypeId=5 THEN '组' END) AS areaName,d.id,d.`name` AS deptName,
d.`name` AS areaName,dc.id,dc.realName AS deptName,
COUNT(f.id) total,
COUNT(CASE WHEN f.followType=${item} THEN f.id END) cell_${item}
FROM sys_dept AS d
RIGHT JOIN sys_user AS dc ON dc.isValid=1 AND dc.deptId=d.id LEFT JOIN hs_followrecord AS f ON f.operatorId=dc.id AND f.isValid=1 AND f.addTime between #{beginDate} AND concat(#{endDate},' 23:59:59')
LEFT JOIN hs_followrecord AS f ON f.isValid=1 AND f.addTime between #{beginDate} AND concat(#{endDate},' 23:59:59') AND f.deptId LIKE CONCAT(d.id,'%')
WHERE d.id IS not NULL AND d.companyId=#{companyId}
and d.id=#{deptId}
GROUP BY dc.id ORDER BY d.id
AND d.deptTypeId=#{deptTypeId} GROUP BY d.id ORDER BY d.id

SELECT
(CASE WHEN d.deptTypeId=2 THEN '大区' WHEN d.deptTypeId=3 THEN '区' WHEN d.deptTypeId=4 THEN '店' WHEN d.deptTypeId=5 THEN '组' END) AS areaName,d.id,d.`name` AS deptName,
d.`name` AS areaName,dc.id,dc.realName AS deptName,
COUNT(CASE WHEN c.statusId=1 THEN f.id END) cell_1,COUNT(CASE WHEN c.statusId=2 THEN f.id END) cell_2,COUNT(CASE WHEN c.statusId=3 THEN f.id END) cell_3, COUNT(CASE WHEN c.statusId=4 THEN f.id END) cell_4,COUNT(CASE WHEN c.statusId=5 THEN f.id END) cell_5,COUNT(CASE WHEN c.statusId=6 THEN f.id END) cell_6, COUNT(CASE WHEN c.statusId=7 THEN f.id END) cell_7,COUNT(CASE WHEN c.statusId=8 THEN f.id END) cell_8,COUNT(f.id) total FROM sys_dept AS d
RIGHT JOIN sys_user AS dc ON dc.isValid=1 AND dc.deptId=d.id LEFT JOIN demand_followrecord AS f ON f.isValid=1 AND f.addTime between #{beginDate} AND concat(#{endDate},' 23:59:59') AND f.operatorId=dc.id
LEFT JOIN demand_followrecord AS f ON f.isValid=1 AND f.addTime between #{beginDate} AND concat(#{endDate},' 23:59:59') AND f.deptId LIKE CONCAT(d.id,'%')
LEFT JOIN demand_customerbusinessinfo AS c ON c.isValid=1 AND c.id=f.demandId WHERE d.id IS not NULL AND d.companyId=#{companyId}
and d.id=#{deptId}
GROUP BY dc.id ORDER BY d.id
AND d.deptTypeId=#{deptTypeId} GROUP BY d.id ORDER BY d.id

SELECT
(CASE WHEN d.deptTypeId=2 THEN '大区' WHEN d.deptTypeId=3 THEN '区' WHEN d.deptTypeId=4 THEN '店' WHEN d.deptTypeId=5 THEN '组' END) AS areaName,d.id,d.`name` AS deptName,
d.`name` AS areaName,dc.id,dc.realName AS deptName,
COUNT(f.id) total,
COUNT(CASE WHEN f.followType=${item} THEN f.id END) cell_${item}
FROM sys_dept AS d
RIGHT JOIN sys_user AS dc ON dc.isValid=1 AND dc.deptId=d.id LEFT JOIN demand_followrecord AS f ON f.operatorId=dc.id AND f.isValid=1 AND f.addTime between #{beginDate} AND concat(#{endDate},' 23:59:59')
LEFT JOIN demand_followrecord AS f ON f.isValid=1 AND f.addTime between #{beginDate} AND concat(#{endDate},' 23:59:59') AND f.deptId LIKE CONCAT(d.id,'%')
WHERE d.id IS not NULL AND d.companyId=#{companyId}
and d.id=#{deptId}
GROUP BY dc.id ORDER BY d.id
AND d.deptTypeId=#{deptTypeId} GROUP BY d.id ORDER BY d.id

SELECT
(CASE WHEN d.deptTypeId=2 THEN '大区' WHEN d.deptTypeId=3 THEN '区' WHEN d.deptTypeId=4 THEN '店' WHEN d.deptTypeId=5 THEN '组' END) AS areaName,d.id,d.`name` AS deptName,
d.`name` AS areaName,dc.id,dc.realName AS deptName,
COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN sh.isValid=1 and sh.openPlateDate between #{beginDate} AND concat(concat(#{endDate},' 23:59:59'),' 23:59:59') THEN sh.id END) AS houseCount,COUNT(DISTINCT f.id) AS followCount,TRUNCATE(COUNT(DISTINCT f.id)/COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN sh.isValid=1 and sh.openPlateDate between #{beginDate} AND concat(#{endDate},' 23:59:59') THEN sh.id END),2) AS avgFollow, TRUNCATE(COUNT(DISTINCT f.id)/COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN sh.isValid=1 and sh.openPlateDate between #{beginDate} AND concat(#{endDate},' 23:59:59') THEN sh.id END)/DATEDIFF(#{endDate},#{beginDate}),2) AS followCycle FROM sys_dept AS d
RIGHT JOIN sys_user AS dc ON dc.isValid=1 AND dc.deptId=d.id LEFT JOIN hs_followrecord AS f ON f.isValid=1 AND f.addTime between #{beginDate} AND concat(#{endDate},' 23:59:59') AND f.operatorId=dc.id
LEFT JOIN hs_followrecord AS f ON f.isValid=1 AND f.addTime between #{beginDate} AND concat(#{endDate},' 23:59:59') AND f.deptId LIKE CONCAT(d.id,'%')
LEFT JOIN hs_secondhandhouse AS sh ON sh.isValid=1
AND sh.mainterDeptId LIKE CONCAT(d.id,'%')
AND sh.maintainId=dc.id
WHERE d.id IS not NULL AND d.companyId=#{companyId}
and d.id=#{deptId}
GROUP BY dc.id ORDER BY d.id
AND d.deptTypeId=#{deptTypeId} GROUP BY d.id ORDER BY d.id

SELECT
(CASE WHEN d.deptTypeId=2 THEN '大区' WHEN d.deptTypeId=3 THEN '区' WHEN d.deptTypeId=4 THEN '店' WHEN d.deptTypeId=5 THEN '组' END) AS areaName,d.id,d.`name` AS deptName,
d.`name` AS areaName,dc.id,dc.realName AS deptName,
COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN c.isValid=1 and c.addTime between #{beginDate} AND concat(#{endDate},' 23:59:59') THEN c.id END) AS customerCount,COUNT(DISTINCT f.id) AS followCount,TRUNCATE(COUNT(DISTINCT f.id)/COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN c.isValid=1 and c.addTime between #{beginDate} AND concat(#{endDate},' 23:59:59') THEN c.id END),2) AS avgFollow, TRUNCATE(COUNT(DISTINCT f.id)/COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN c.isValid=1 and c.addTime between #{beginDate} AND concat(#{endDate},' 23:59:59') THEN c.id END)/DATEDIFF(#{endDate} ,#{beginDate}),2) AS followCycle FROM sys_dept AS d
RIGHT JOIN sys_user AS dc ON dc.isValid=1 AND dc.deptId=d.id LEFT JOIN demand_followrecord AS f ON f.isValid=1 AND f.addTime between #{beginDate} AND concat(#{endDate},' 23:59:59') AND f.operatorId=dc.id
LEFT JOIN demand_followrecord AS f ON f.isValid=1 AND f.addTime between #{beginDate} AND concat(#{endDate},' 23:59:59') AND f.deptId LIKE CONCAT(d.id,'%')
LEFT JOIN demand_customerbusinessinfo AS c ON c.isValid=1
AND c.mainterDeptId LIKE CONCAT(d.id,'%')
AND c.maintainId=dc.id
WHERE d.id IS not NULL AND d.companyId=#{companyId}
and d.id=#{deptId}
GROUP BY dc.id ORDER BY d.id
AND d.deptTypeId=#{deptTypeId} GROUP BY d.id ORDER BY d.id
